text: Igor Dmitrievich Sergeev (Russian: Игорь Дмитриевич Сергеев; 20 April 1938 — 10 November 2006) was a Russian politician. He served as a Minister of Defence of Russia from 22 May 1997 to 28 March 2001. == Other websites == * Structure Mil.ru Category:1938 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Soviet military people Category:Soviet generals Category:Ministers of Defence of Russia
title: Igor Sergeev
